SIF is a flux byproduct that is mechanistically linked to photosynthesis
39 , and has been shown to have a near-linear relationship with ecosystem GPP at the monthly and ecosystem scales
40â€“ 42 . Based on this relation, it has been successfully used as a proxy for GPP for numerous applications
32, 43 , and is used in this study as an indicator of biosphere activity. As with the model GPP data, the SIF data are normalized by their maximum value in time. The SIF data are detrended using a convolution to account for signal deterioration over the lifetime of the satellite.
